typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		productName as string,
		productCategory_id as integer,
		price as double,
		created_date as timestamp,
		modified_date as timestamp,
		medida as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from stg_product',
	format: 'query') ~> product
source(output(
		id as integer,
		productCategoryName as string,
		productSubCategory_id as integer,
		created_date as timestamp,
		modified_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from stg_productCategory',
	format: 'query') ~> ProductCategory
source(output(
		id as integer,
		productSubCategoryName as string,
		created_date as timestamp,
		modified_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from stg_productSubCategory',
	format: 'query') ~> productSubCategory
source(output(
		sk_product_id as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		productName as string,
		price as double,
		medida as string,
		created_date as timestamp,
		modified_date as timestamp,
		productCategory_id as integer,
		productCategoryName as string,
		productSubCategory_id as integer,
		productSubCategoryName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dimProduct
product, ProductCategory join(productCategory_id == ProductCategory@id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
join1, productSubCategory join(productSubCategory_id == productSubCategory@id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		product_id = product@id,
		productName,
		price,
		medida,
		modified_date = product@modified_date,
		created_date = product@created_date,
		productCategory_id,
		productCategoryName,
		productSubCategory_id,
		productSubCategoryName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns, dimProduct exists(SelectColumns@product_id == dimProduct@product_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists, dimProduct lookup(SelectColumns@product_id == dimProduct@product_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupProductID
LookupProductID alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpserts
AllowUpserts sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['product_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		product_id = SelectColumns@product_id,
		productName = SelectColumns@productName,
		price = SelectColumns@price,
		medida = SelectColumns@medida,
		modified_date = SelectColumns@modified_date,
		created_date = SelectColumns@created_date,
		productCategory_id = SelectColumns@productCategory_id,
		productCategoryName = SelectColumns@productCategoryName,
		productSubCategory_id = SelectColumns@productSubCategory_id,
		productSubCategoryName = SelectColumns@productSubCategoryName
	)) ~> writeDimProduct
